entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. A few flurries near the British Columbia border in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
